verses.roman:
tatra śraddhā manoḥ patnī
hotāraṁ samayācata
duhitrartham upāgamya
praṇipatya payovratā

synonyms: tatra—in that sacrifice; śraddhā—Śraddhā; manoḥ—of Manu; patnī—the wife; hotāram—to the priest performing the yajña; samayācata—begged properly; duhitṛ-artham—for a daughter; upāgamya—coming near; praṇipatya—offering obeisances; payaḥ-vratā—who was observing the vow of drinking only milk.
translation: During that sacrifice, Śraddhā, Manu's wife, who was observing the vow of subsisting only by drinking milk, approached the priest offering the sacrifice, offered obeisances to him and begged for a daughter.
